regen.absent_element: adjustability of the facility map refresh rate
regen.new_specification: The facility map refresh rate shall be adjustable as per configuration settings in the database, defaulting to every 2 seconds.

regen.absent_element: adjustability of the facility map refresh rate controlled through database
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow the refresh rate of the facility map to be adjusted through settings in the database.

regen.absent_element: adjustable refresh rate for the facility map
regen.new_specification: The refresh rate of the facility map shall be modifiable according to the settings specified in the database.

label: Refreshrate of the facility map can be configurable within the database to more than 2 seconds by the user.
absence: action of modifying refresh rate within the database
